Interface Storage

All Known Implementing Classes:
StorageFile
public interface Storage

Interface for key/value storage TODO

  • Correct documentation (copied from StorageFile)
  • Add method link() that links a key to another key. void link(String newKey, String sameAsKey); List keys(String key); // gets the links to this data

Method Summary
 byte[] get(String key)
          Get the data for a given key.
 boolean has(String key)
          Determines if the key exists in the file.
 boolean put(String key, byte[] data)
          Stores a given key/data pair in the file.
 boolean put(String key, byte[] data, boolean doNotGrow)
          Stores a given key/data pair in the file.
 boolean remove(String key)
          Removes a key from the file (marks the space reusable).
 long size()
          Gets the number of bytes used on disk for this storage file.
 long size(boolean free)
          Returns the total size in the storage file used for either free or key/data blocks.
 

Method Detail

get

byte[] get(String key)
           throws IOException
Get the data for a given key.

Parameters:
key - The unique key in the file.
Returns:
The data for the key, or null if not found.
Throws:
IOException - If there are any IO errors

has

boolean has(String key)
            throws IOException
Determines if the key exists in the file.

Parameters:
key - The key to look for.
Returns:
true if the key is in the file, false if not
Throws:
IOException - If there are any IO errors

remove

boolean remove(String key)
               throws IOException
Removes a key from the file (marks the space reusable).

Parameters:
key - The key to remove.
Returns:
true if the key existed, false otherwise.
Throws:
IOException - If there are any IO errors

put

boolean put(String key,
            byte[] data)
            throws IOException
Stores a given key/data pair in the file. If the key exists already in the file, nothing will be done. Allows the buffer to grow (doNotGrow = false).

Parameters:
key - The key for the data.
data - The data to store in the file.
Returns:
true if the key/data were added, false if the key already exists in the file
Throws:
IOException - If there are any IO errors

put

boolean put(String key,
            byte[] data,
            boolean doNotGrow)
            throws IOException
Stores a given key/data pair in the file. If the key exists already in the file, nothing will be done.

Parameters:
key - The key for the data.
data - The data to store in the file.
doNotGrow - If true, the file will not be expanded to add this key/data
Returns:
true if the key/data were added, false if the key already exists in the file
Throws:
IOException - If there are any IO errors

size

long size()
          throws IOException
Gets the number of bytes used on disk for this storage file.

Returns:
The number of bytes on disk.
Throws:
IOException - If there are any IO errors

size

long size(boolean free)
          throws IOException
Returns the total size in the storage file used for either free or key/data blocks.

Parameters:
free - true means add up the size of the free blocks, false means add up the size of the key/data blocks
Returns:
The number of bytes used
Throws:
IOException - If there are any IO errors
